location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Plan 10. Sketch Map to illustrate Operations for the Relief of Kut’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:201 x 338 mm, on sheet 245 x 380 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Ordnance Survey, 1921.Distinctive Features:Sketch map showing operations for the relief of Kut Al ‘Amara drawn from plan prepared by G.S. India with position of British trenches (8-9 March) and lines of Turkish entrenchment marked and details on width and depth of canal banks given.Relief shown by hachures.
